thread.title: Watch – EFF takes #FeesMustFall protest inside Parliament, ‘Blade must go’ chanted outside
thread.title_full: Watch – EFF takes #FeesMustFall protest inside Parliament, ‘Blade must go’ chanted outside | News24

author: news24.com
title: Watch – EFF takes #FeesMustFall protest inside Parliament, ‘Blade must go’ chanted outside
text:
Parliament yesterday saw chaos both inside and outside as the Economic Freedom Fighters and students called for fees to fall.
EFF MPs stood up in the house with posters in hand saying fees must fall.
This was in solidarity with thousands of students across the country calling for a zero percent increase for the 2016 tuition.
Acting speaker Thoko Didiza called on the Parliamentary Protection Services to remove EFF members from the house.
